channel.title: Leadership on Rob's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Rob's Notes

item.title: The Ride of a Lifetime
item.description: “Optimism in a leader, especially in challenging times, is so vital. Pessimism leads to paranoia, which leads to defensiveness, which leads to risk aversion. Optimism sets a different machine in motion.

item.title: Dare to Lead
item.description: “Daring leadership is ultimately about serving other people, not ourselves. That’s why we choose courage.” ~ From Dare to Lead: Brave Work. Tough Conversations. Whole Hearts.
